    • Method Detail

      • setVs

        public void setVs(VectorSpaceModel vs)

      • initializeCategories

        public void initializeCategories(java.lang.Object[][] category_table_object,
                                 javax.swing.table.TableModel tm_categories,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<CategoryNode> first_level,
                                 javax.swing.table.TableCellRenderer tcr)
        Intitalizes all GUI objects which belong to the categories section.
        Parameters:
        category_table_object - content table of objects for the categories
        tm_categories - the categories table model
        first_level - first level of CategoryNodes. These are the chooseable categories.
        tcr - TableCellRenderer for formatting of the cell

      • initializeSlider

        public void initializeSlider()
        Intitializes all necessary Objects for the restriction slider

      • getSearchActionListener

        public java.awt.event.ActionListener getSearchActionListener(java.lang.Object[][] category_table_object)
        Calls all necessary methods from the VectorSpaceModel class and writes the retrieved ranking to the results table in the GUI. Each search is started in an own Thread so the GUI is not blocked while searching.
        Parameters:
        category_table_object - The Table object containing the root categories if categries are enabled
        Returns:
        returns the ActionListener which is invoked when Search started

      • addResultsMouseListener

        public void addResultsMouseListener()
        Sets the ActionListener for a double click on a cell of the results table in the GUI. After the double click a Message Box is shown to the user which contains the documents content.

      • addEvaluateClickListener

        public java.awt.event.ActionListener addEvaluateClickListener()
        Adds the ActionListener for the evaluation button. After clicking all necessary methods for the evaluation are called. The evaluation also runs in a separate Thread to be independent to the GUI Thread.
        Returns:
        returns the ActionListener for the evaluate button, which is used later to invoke it manually, when the corresponding flag is set in the commandline

      • createHistogramm

        public void createHistogramm(double[] first_arr,
                             double[] second_arr,
                             double[] x_axis,
                             java.lang.String first_name,
                             java.lang.String second_name,
                             double scale,
                             java.lang.String x_axis_name,
                             java.lang.String y_axis_name,
                             java.lang.String histogram_name)
        Method to create histograms with 1 or 2 bars.
        Parameters:
        first_arr - Array containing the values for the first part of the bars
        second_arr - Array containing the values for the second part of the bars or null
        x_axis - Containing the values which should be shown on the x-axis
        first_name - The name of the values of the first array
        second_name - The name of the values of the second array
        scale - The scale which should be used on the values
        x_axis_name - This variable contains the name of the x-axis
        y_axis_name - This variable contains the name of the y-axis
        histogram_name - This variable contains the name of the histogram itself

      • saveAsChartAsPng

        public void saveAsChartAsPng(org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart chart,
                             java.lang.String chart_title)
        Method to save a chart in as PNG-Image in the evaluation folder. If the evaluation folder exists the images are saved in the folder, otherwise the folder is created beforehand.
        Parameters:
        chart - The variable containing the chart, which has the evaluation data.
        chart_title - This parameter contains the chart title.

      • addChooseFileListener

        public void addChooseFileListener()
        This method opens a File-Selection dialog, to choose a file for Indexing.

      • addIndexClickListener

        public void addIndexClickListener()
        This method starts the indexing process, when a file and the correct XML-Handler is chosen.

      • getEvaluateListener

        public java.awt.event.ActionListener getEvaluateListener()
        Returns:
        Returns the ActionListener implemented for the Click on the Evaluate button.

      • setHistogramPrefix

        public void setHistogramPrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
        Sets the prefix for the histograms, which can be set as commandline flag.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The string prefix, which is concatenated on front of the folder created for the evaluation.

      • setSuppressHistograms

        public void setSuppressHistograms(boolean suppress)
        Parameters:
        suppress - Contains the boolean, which tells if the histograms should be displayed or not

      • getEvaluationThread

        public java.lang.Thread getEvaluationThread()
        Returns:
        Returns the thread in which the evaluation is calculated.
